backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, admin authorization (including allowlisted admin), invite-link management, and vehicle records with notifications.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing admin-allowlist, admin-data-flow, and invite-token features with related files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing frontend components, hooks, pages, and infrastructure behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining light/dark color variables and base element styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting meta tags, PWA manifest, icons, and mounting the React root with main.tsx.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, and categories.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache management with network-first HTML and cache-first static asset strategies.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining all application routes and wrapping the app in ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message and optionally allows eligible users to claim first admin access by submitting profile info.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileBoot: Shows detailed profile loading errors with classification-based guidance and options to copy error details or retry.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInScree: Renders the Internet Identity sign‑in screen with app branding and security feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/auth/StartupBoot: Displays startup initialization errors with troubleshooting tips and a retry button.
frontend/src/components/brand/AppLogo.ts: Shows the app logo image in configurable sizes.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Wraps app pages with optional header and footer based on authentication and onboarding state.
frontend/src/components/lost/MarkLostDia: Dialog allowing users to report a vehicle as lost with required notes and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/lost/ReportFound: Dialog for submitting a found‑vehicle report with user‑provided details and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/nav/AppHeader.ts: Navigation header component that renders main routes, user menu, and admin link handling based on identity and admin status.
frontend/src/components/system/TopLevelE: Error boundary that catches top-level render errors and shows a fallback UI.
Fallback screen shown on critical app errors with guidance and a reload button.
frontend/src/components/transfer/Initiat: Panel to initiate a vehicle transfer, prompting for PIN and showing a generated transfer code and shareable link.
frontend/src/components/transfer/PinProm: Reusable dialog prompting the user for a PIN with validation and error display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorBootstrapStat: Hook exposing actor initialization state with error detection and a retry mechanism.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Admin‑related hooks for checking admin status, onboarding the first admin, and fetching admin‑restricted data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login state, loading identities, and creating AuthClient instances.
frontend/src/hooks/useLostVehicles.ts: Exports hooks to fetch lost vehicles, mark a vehicle as lost, and report a vehicle as found using react-query mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Implements hooks for retrieving current user notifications and marking them as read with react‑query.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnboarding.ts: Contains a mutation hook to complete user onboarding and refresh the current user profile.
frontend/src/hooks/usePin.ts: Provides mutation hooks to set up or update a user PIN through actor calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Offers hooks to fetch and save the caller's user profile, keyed by the current Internet Identity principal.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransfers.ts: Defines mutations to initiate and accept vehicle transfers and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicles.ts: Includes hooks to fetch user vehicles, fetch a specific vehicle, and register new vehicles with react‑query caching.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining color variables, dark mode theme, and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry file setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an informational About page describing the app, its features, and admin contact details.
frontend/src/pages/AcceptTransferPage.ts: Page for accepting a vehicle transfer by entering a code, handling form submission and success/error states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin-only dashboard that verifies access and displays system statistics such as vehicles, reports, and users.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInviteToke: Admin interface for generating, viewing, and copying invite tokens, with access control and token status sections.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard showing vehicle, lost vehicle, and notification stats with quick actions and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/LostVehiclesPage.tsx: Lists reported lost vehicles with search filtering and a detail card display.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Displays user notifications and allows marking items as read.
Handles user onboarding via invite token and profile form submission.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows and edits the user's profile with form-based updates and logout support.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterVehiclePage.t: Form for registering a new vehicle including photo upload with progress tracking.
Provides UI and logic for creating or updating a PIN, including validation and form handling.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information about a specific vehicle with status badges and owner-specific actions.
frontend/src/pages/VehiclesPage.tsx: Shows the user's registered vehicles with status indicators and navigation to registration or detail pages.
frontend/src/routes/RootRouteGate.tsx: Handles auth, profile loading, admin allowlist checks, and redirects; shows loading or error screens until the app is ready.
frontend/src/utils/actorProxy.ts: Wraps backend actors to safely handle admin access-control initialization and suppress invalid-token errors.
frontend/src/utils/actorQueryKey.ts: Generates a consistent React Query key for actor-related queries using the caller’s principal.
frontend/src/utils/adminAllowlist.ts: Provides a fixed admin principal allowlist check and exposes the hardcoded admin ID.
frontend/src/utils/bootstrapError.ts: Classifies bootstrap errors, extracts technical messages, and formats them for display or clipboard use.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Manages URL and sessionStorage parameters, including persistence, retrieval, and cleanup of sensitive values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and container settings for the frontend build.
project_state.json: Captures project metadata, architecture notes, known issues, and feature tracking for the application.
